meanings.definition: (Greek mythology) A son of Pelias, king of Iolcus.
meanings.english_definition: In Greek mythology, one of the sons of Pelias, king of Iolcus.

examples.sentence: Ampycides was among the sons of Pelias who were tricked by Medea.
examples.translation: アムピュキデスは、メーデイアに騙されたペリアスの息子の一人でした。
